newsitem.headline: The Transition?
newsitem.text: Sapphire Launcher has been in development for 2 years and continuing. Questions have been asked will we ever see a sequel to Sapphire Launcher? A rebase? With the development of Sapphyx Launcher, it will divide the user base in 2 groups. A premium group and fremium group. Sapphyx will be more original with bare minimum android libs used and Sapphire Launcher being a group project. Sapphire Launcher uses deprecated code from launcher 3 base tree providing users a compat usage between android 5 and beyond. With a possible suggested sequel with rebased code as a seperate package. Reasons for a seperate package is the updated code cant handle older methods of customization, the same features but different methods. This would provide an upgrade to returning users. Sapphyx Launcher is more of a private project testing my ability to perform providing me funds to continue my work. In order for me to continue to serve the community, time must be invested this year as my life becomes more busy with work and family.

newsitem.headline: Slab
newsitem.text: A new application is currently in the works for Dashclock users. Slab is a Google On-Tap replacement to serve as a search engine and dashclock widget provider. More information will become available as it starts to take shape.

newsitem.headline: GSD Newsfeed Changes
newsitem.text: The official news feed page will be removed from the navigation menu on GocalSD. This change will make the GSD Mobile app more convenient as the newsfeed will than load on the app and direct users to a page with more information. This change will take affect in later October.

newsitem.headline: Enjoy my work?
newsitem.text: Please take the time to rate GSD Mobile on Google Play and share it with friends that may like my work. Im expanding my horizons in 2017 to increase popularity, revenue and knowledge. Bigger and better things are in the horizon.

newsitem.headline: Slab
newsitem.text: Based on Sapphire Launcher's Dashclock Panel feature, Slab is a new dashclock management app set to release in 2017 for Android 6.0+ More information as it becomes available. It will also be an add-on for Project Niebieski.

newsitem.headline: Sapphire's Fall Update
newsitem.text: The new launcher update is expected to drop in October with a variety of interface changes and enhancements for Android N and bugs fixes that have been tracked since discovery. Stay tuned to GSD.

newsitem.headline: Nx Certificates
newsitem.text: The Sapphire Launcher license keys will be updated soon to be universal keys for future projects. They will also be renamed Nx certificates based on their class. This will not affect Sapphire Launcher users in any way but will affect any users who simply installed the APKs without purchasing them. A licensed verification will be made and I will be notified of who isn't using a verified key. This will be logged in the Google dev console. Your device will be logged simply, nothing more unless you have a past history of purchases with me or returns.

newsitem.headline: Niebieski Information services
newsitem.text: New information about the launcher project going into development soon is surfacing on GSD. Sapphyx Launcher will put the hammer down for performance and reliability for a launcher desktop in Android N with custom performance drivers, a hybrid key registry and more expansion based enhancements.

newsitem.headline: Game with the dev!
newsitem.text: Hit me up on PS4 Dracos_Aura or Windows10 Live GT Dracos Aura

newsitem.headline: Prism Assistant
newsitem.text: A new update will be releasing for Prism Assistant. This update brings a new interface, a few new bug fixes for Android N and... It will become a free application and bring un-intrusive ads.

newsitem.headline: 2017 Expected Roadmap
newsitem.text: Several new apps are in development for GSD to release in 2017 and several major updates for legacy apps. A wide range of new tools, utilities and methods will be used to develop the new gen release of apps using 64bit technology and compilers. A great learning process.

newsitem.headline: System76 Kudo Donation
newsitem.text: Recent development is of need of a more powerful workspace. I am currently investing Onyx keys and Ads revenue towards a System 76 Kudo for Android development. If you'd like to donate to this, you may send a small donation to my gmail via Google Wallet. Recent updates Via windows10 have corrupted my ability to manage a dual boot system of Ubuntu and Windows and risking valuable information and data isnt apart of my game plan.

newsitem.headline: Welcome to the Newsfeed!
newsitem.text: You'll find current events, announcments, blog summaries, project exclusive info and more here!
